Player History
Drafted in 10th round, 150th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Wendell Cox (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/1/2015, off Wendell Cox (HOU)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2016, hitting .471 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2016, hitting .346 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2016, hitting .320 with 10 HR, 34 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 9/9/2016...
Injured on 9/27/2016 with a Sprained Ankle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/5/2017 to a 1-year deal worth $14,500,000 per year...
Drove in 7 runs against New York on 4/20/2017...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 6/26/2017...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/4/2018 to a 4-year deal worth $3,200,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
